posts.post_content:
For sale are two really cool old BB related postcards.

1. 1910s era HAND PAINTED postcard. Caught between bases. Unused and super unusual. Looks much nicer than picture  sold. thx 

2. 1913 dated odd Japan postcard. writer mentions a German pitcher who he saw who he wants to pitch for his local team Very strange and cool 30

Please add 3.00 towards partial Ground Advantage tracked shipping. PM to buy. Don't miss out on these cool items. Plus see my unusual 1957 baseball error uncut panel for sale. 

55  with Free ship for both Thank you! Scott
